Room.Name: Rue Caledonia
Room.ShortDescription: You are south of Hafnia Central park on Rue Caledonia.
Room.LongDescription: To the south is the circle road which travels all the way around the city. On the west side of the street is a large lot covered with tents and a lot of people. Looks like another caravan is getting ready to leave the city. A lot of stuff comes here from Oceancrest, but Hafnia also exports some very finely made elven crafts, such as archery tackle.
